23 #include <TiledArray/dist_eval/dist_eval.h>

25 namespace TiledArray {
26 namespace detail {

29 
35 template <typename Arg, typename Op, typename Policy>
36 class UnaryEvalImpl
37  : public DistEvalImpl<typename Op::result_type, Policy>,
38  public std::enable_shared_from_this<UnaryEvalImpl<Arg, Op, Policy> > {
39  public:
40  typedef UnaryEvalImpl<Arg, Op, Policy> UnaryEvalImpl_;
41  typedef DistEvalImpl<typename Op::result_type, Policy>
42  DistEvalImpl_;
43  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::TensorImpl_
44  TensorImpl_;
45  typedef Arg arg_type;
46  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::size_type size_type;
47  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::range_type range_type;
48  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::shape_type shape_type;
49  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::pmap_interface
50  pmap_interface;
51  typedef
52  typename DistEvalImpl_::trange_type trange_type;
53  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::value_type value_type;
54  typedef
55  typename DistEvalImpl_::eval_type eval_type;
56  typedef Op op_type;
57 
59 
67  UnaryEvalImpl(const arg_type& arg, World& world, const trange_type& trange,
68  const shape_type& shape,
69  const std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>& pmap,
70  const Permutation& perm, const op_type& op)
71  : DistEvalImpl_(world, trange, shape, pmap, perm), arg_(arg), op_(op) {}
72 
74  virtual ~UnaryEvalImpl() {}
75 
77 
82  virtual Future<value_type> get_tile(size_type i) const {
83  TA_ASSERT(TensorImpl_::is_local(i));
84  TA_ASSERT(!TensorImpl_::is_zero(i));
85  const size_type source = arg_.owner(DistEvalImpl_::perm_index_to_source(i));
86  const madness::DistributedID key(DistEvalImpl_::id(), i);
87  return TensorImpl_::world().gop.template recv<value_type>(source, key);
88  }
89 
91 
95  virtual void discard_tile(size_type i) const { get_tile(i); }
96 
97  private:
99 
102  typedef typename std::conditional<
103  op_type::is_consumable, typename arg_type::value_type&,
104  const typename arg_type::value_type&>::type tile_argument_type;
105 
107 
108 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
109  template <typename U = value_type>
112  std::enable_if_t<detail::is_cuda_tile<U>::value, void> eval_tile(
113  const size_type i, tile_argument_type tile) {
114  // TODO avoid copy Op object
115  auto result_tile =
116  madness::add_cuda_task(DistEvalImpl_::world(), op_, tile);
117  DistEvalImpl_::set_tile(i, result_tile);
118  }
119 
122  template <typename U = value_type>
123  std::enable_if_t<!detail::is_cuda_tile<U>::value, void> eval_tile(
124  const size_type i, tile_argument_type tile) {
125  DistEvalImpl_::set_tile(i, op_(tile));
126  }
127 #else
128  void eval_tile(const size_type i, tile_argument_type tile) {
131  DistEvalImpl_::set_tile(i, op_(tile));
132  }
133 #endif
134 
141  virtual int internal_eval() {
142  // Convert pimpl to this object type so it can be used in tasks
143  std::shared_ptr<UnaryEvalImpl_> self =
144  std::enable_shared_from_this<UnaryEvalImpl_>::shared_from_this();
145 
146  // Evaluate argument
147  arg_.eval();
148 
149  // Counter for the number of tasks submitted by this object
150  size_type task_count = 0ul;
151 
152  // Make sure all local tiles are present.
153  const typename pmap_interface::const_iterator end = arg_.pmap()->end();
154  typename pmap_interface::const_iterator it = arg_.pmap()->begin();
155  for (; it != end; ++it) {
156  // Get argument tile index
157  const size_type index = *it;
158 
159  if (!arg_.is_zero(index)) {
160  // Get target tile index
161  const size_type target_index =
162  DistEvalImpl_::perm_index_to_target(index);
163 
164  // Schedule tile evaluation task
165 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
166  TensorImpl_::world().taskq.add(self,
167  &UnaryEvalImpl_::template eval_tile<>,
168  target_index, arg_.get(index));
169 #else
170  TensorImpl_::world().taskq.add(self, &UnaryEvalImpl_::eval_tile,
171  target_index, arg_.get(index));
172 #endif
173 
174  ++task_count;
175  }
176  }
177 
178  // Wait for local tiles of argument to be evaluated
179  arg_.wait();
180 
181  return task_count;
182  }
183 
184  arg_type arg_;
185  op_type op_;
186 }; // class UnaryEvalImpl
187 
188 } // namespace detail
189 } // namespace TiledArray
